PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (PART V) by clarifying certain existing requirements concerning the calibration of measuring devices and testing equipment and by introducing record-keeping requirements applicable to the holders of an approved maintenance organization certificate, effective June 1, 2003.
